name: Theophylline
indications: theophylline oral solution indicated treatment symptoms reversible airflow obstruction associated chronic asthma chronic lung diseases , e.g . , emphysema chronic bronchitis .
warningsAndPrecautions: theophylline oral solution , usp 80 mg/15 ml orange-flavored , clear , colorless slightly yellow solution . 15 ml ( one tablespoonful ) contains 80 mg theophylline anhydrous . theophylline oral solution , usp available bottles 16 fl . oz . ( 473 ml ) ndc 27808-033-01 store 20˚ 25˚c ( 68˚ 77˚f ) ; excursions permitted 15˚ 30˚c ( 59˚ 86˚f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense tight container . distributed : atlantic biologicals corp. miami , fl 33179
adverseReactions: theophylline oral solution contraindicated patients history hypersensitivity theophylline components product .
indications_original: Theophylline oral solution is indicated for the treatment of the symptoms and reversible airflow obstruction associated with chronic asthma and other chronic lung diseases, e.g., emphysema and chronic bronchitis.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Theophylline Oral Solution, USP 80 mg/15 mL is an orange-flavored, clear, colorless to slightly yellow solution. Each 15 mL (one tablespoonful) contains 80 mg theophylline anhydrous.
                  Theophylline Oral Solution, USP is available in bottles of 16 fl. oz. (473 mL) NDC 27808-033-01
                  Store at 20˚ to 25˚C (68˚ to 77˚F); excursions permitted from 15˚ to 30˚C (59˚ to 86˚F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Dispense in tight container.
                  
                     DISTRIBUTED BY:
                  
                  ATLANTIC BIOLOGICALS CORP.
                  MIAMI, FL 33179
adverseReactions_original: Theophylline oral solution is contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to theophylline or other components in the product.
